titleStmt.title: A substantial and Godly exposition of the praier commonly called the Lords Praier: written in Latin by that reuerend & famous man, D. Martine Chemnitivs. Newly translated out of Latine into English
titleStmt.author: Chemnitz, Martin, 1522-1586.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legate, Printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An exposition upon the Lords praier.
Dated in the sill of border (McKerrow & Ferguson 210).
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
